org.mapdb

Class CacheHardRef

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mapdb.EngineWrapper
      • org.mapdb.CacheLRU
        • org.mapdb.CacheHardRef
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Engine

    public class CacheHardRef
extends CacheLRU
    Cache created objects using hard reference. It uses JMX extension to detect when free memory is running out (less than 25%) and clears cache content than.
    Author:
    Jan Kotek

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
        Description copied from interface: Engine
        Close store/cache. This method must be called before JVM exits to flush all caches and prevent store corruption. Also it releases resources used by MapDB (disk, memory..).

        Engine can no longer be used after this method was called. If Engine is used after closing, it may throw any exception including NullPointerException

        There is an configuration option DBMaker.closeOnJvmShutdown() which uses shutdown hook to automatically close Engine when JVM shutdowns.
        Specified by:
        close in interface Engine
        Overrides:
        close in class CacheLRU

      • addMemoryLowListener

        public static void addMemoryLowListener(Runnable listener)
        add listener which is called when free memory is running low.

      • removeMemoryLowListener

        public static void removeMemoryLowListener(Runnable listener)
        removes free memory low listener
